title: Desolation Row
description: A bride from Texas uses her CIA-honed skills to catch the real killer when her husband lands in a Canadian jail.Amazon: "Remarkable dialog & subplots result in a wholly satisfying read. Packs a considerable punch. Readers will look forward to more of Kendall, with her formidable intellect, tart sense of humor, & resolute sense of justice. Unexpectedly magnificent."Award winning author Hank Phillippi Ryan: "Deception, intrigue and authentic sixties nostalgia. The passionately anti-war generation hoped to give peace a chance, but in this entertaining mystery would up with murder instead."" A great heroine, authentic period details, and a satisfying conclusion!" says author James Ziskin Best-selling thriller writer Norb Vonnegut: "A brutal murder, a woman fighting to prove her husband's innocence--DESOLATION ROW hooked me on page one. Author Kay Kendall knows how to burrow into your heart."
author: Kay Kendall
